attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have come across more discrimination towards my family than perhaps even the so-called minority groups.
Due to having my integrity consistantly questioned, my own and my husbands ill-health, - when I have duplicated repeatedly and posted this information -  having my intelligence insulted, no compassion nor acknowledgments received when discussing all these issues,the incompetance of these offices being blamed on myself, living in council property - so treated differently - being disabled, being a step-parent, and I believe being of white skin, English born, aged nearly 50 years.  The above and increasingly deformation of charactor, tantamount to slander!I have made an appt. with our local government mp, and have issued him with nearly 200 copies of proof of relevant information.
doreen gerrard-atkinson

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
